text: Hello Jane.  So sorry for my tardy reply.  I didn’t see the notification.  I hope I’m not too late.

Your new statement is definitely better. I think we just need to look at the order a wee bit.  If I’m the person looking at your application, the first thing I want you to tell me is that you want to come on my course and why.

I’ve created a google doc with a bit of a structure for you to think about.  Hopefully it makes sense. You have lots of good things to say I just think you need to think about how and when you mention them so that the person reading your statement goes away thinking.  Jane sounds perfect for our course.  She’s clearly curious and creative and looking to broaden her ability and knowledge.  See what you think <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_UjD5W8Gd_dFhqjXr0_XSG2hhaN8xOLBXfSRIGoV2_8/edit?usp=sharing>  Very happy to answer questions. I’ll make sure I’m checking the chat more often.
